price: Hiç şüphesiz Allah, iman edenleri savunur. Gerçekten Allah, hain ve nankör olan kimseyi sevmez.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٖ كَفُورٍ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yudāfiʿu ʿani alladhīna āmanū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu kulla khawwānin kafūrin
